name: Cobra Kai 1
description:
This is a demo of a fangame. I love the KarateKid and CobraKai franchise, so I decideed to develop a videogame based on the season 1 of Cobra Kai.
This demo will cover the first 7 levels of the game: the first has beat em up mechanics, the second and the third are training levels.

USE ARROWS TO MOVE YOUR CHARACTER.
USE A TO PUNCH
USE D TO KICK
USE SPACEBAR TO SELECT COMBO
ESE ENTER TO PAUSE
